title: Enhancing Pre-Service Teachers' Competencies in Aligning Instructional Design Practices with Beliefs [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational design theories and language teaching experience
context.additional_context: As educational administrators/leaders, possess experience in language education program development and operation, and can perform collaborative projects in digital environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three differences between pre-service teachers' beliefs and instructional design practices through case studies
Learners can classify instructional design cases into student-centered/teacher-centered approaches using portfolio assessment criteria
Learners can collaboratively propose blended belief-based instructional designs to enhance learner engagement in PBL environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
